医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
地中海饮食是否会降低非地中海人群 2 型糖尿病的发病率？研究人员调查了坚持地中海饮食与 2 型糖尿病患病率之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Does-the-Mediterranean-diet-lower-the-incidence-of-type-2-diabetes-among-non-Mediterranean-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Does-the-Mediterranean-diet-lower-the-incidence-of-type-2-diabetes-among-non-Mediterranean-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2564fd72-15e4-4663-9fcf-1eb8073dae37 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 10:03:00 -0400 Does the Mediterranean diet lower the incidence of type 2 diabetes among non-Mediterranean populations?
体力活动如何影响生育能力？研究人员回顾了现有文献，以了解运动对生育能力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/How-does-physical-activity-impact-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/How-does-physical-activity-impact-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4051ca9-aa0a-4f44-977c-bb6115e2bb1e Thu, 06 Jul 2023 09:29:00 -0400 How does physical activity impact fertility?
Sphere Fluidics 扩展了 Cyto-Mine 功能，以满足药品制造工作流程的 cGMP 要求Sphere Fluidics 是一家开发以其专利 picodroplet 技术为基础的单细胞分析系统的公司，今天宣布更新其旗舰平台 Cyto-Mine®，使其符合美国 FDA 执行的现行良好生产规范 (cGMP) 法规。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Sphere-Fluidics-expands-Cyto-Mine-capability-to-meet-cGMP-requirements-for-drug-manufacture-workflows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Sphere-Fluidics-expands-Cyto-Mine-capability-to-meet-cGMP-requirements-for-drug-manufacture-workflows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d7b9f90-17c0-48a8-893a-2e6483bab1bb Thu, 06 Jul 2023 09:22:00 -0400 Sphere Fluidics expands Cyto-Mine capabilities to meet cGMP requirements for drug manufacture workflows
活体数码相机：科学家捕捉 DNA 中的光模式以进行图像存储研究人员描述了一种将二维 (2D) 光图案捕获到 DNA 中的技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Living-digital-camera-scientists-capture-light-patterns-in-DNA-for-image-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Living-digital-camera-scientists-capture-light-patterns-in-DNA-for-image-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c83382e8-2e9b-4c02-bdfa-36f3802b1b24 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 09:03:00 -0400 Living digital camera: scientists capture light patterns in DNA for image storage
健康饮食可以预防痴呆症并减缓生物衰老的速度吗？研究测试了健康饮食是否可以减缓生物衰老，从而减缓痴呆症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Does-a-healthy-diet-protect-against-dementia-and-slow-the-pace-of-biological-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Does-a-healthy-diet-protect-against-dementia-and-slow-the-pace-of-biological-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c30f171-d85f-4291-bdef-239f48f5a944 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 08:21:00 -0400 Does a healthy diet protect against dementia and slow the pace of biological aging?
研究为为什么某些 CAR T 细胞在白血病儿童体内持续存在提供了新见解伦敦大学学院、大奥蒙德街医院和 Wellcome Sanger 研究所的研究人员揭示了新的见解，解释了为什么有些儿童在接受尖端 CAR T 细胞疗法治疗白血病后比其他儿童的缓解时间更长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-offers-new-insights-into-why-some-CAR-T-cells-persist-in-children-with-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Study-offers-new-insights-into-why-some-CAR-T-cells-persist-in-children-with-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8e9fac9-8b5e-4003-a1e8-82d473c50bbe Thu, 06 Jul 2023 07:05:08 -0400 Study offers new insights into why some CAR T-cells persist in children with leukemia
解开免疫难题：研究评估第二次加强 COVID-19 疫苗的免疫影响研究人员评估了急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) Delta 变种 (VOC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Unlocking-the-immune-puzzle-study-evaluates-the-immune-impact-of-second-booster-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Unlocking-the-immune-puzzle-study-evaluates-the-immune-impact-of-second-booster-COVID-19-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e959f05-3f3c-4910-b442-76e615a2a9aa Thu, 06 Jul 2023 06:56:00 -0400 Unlocking the immune puzzle: study evaluates the immune impact of second booster COVID-19 vaccine
为什么阿尔茨海默氏症的下一个大希望可能无法帮助大多数黑人患者本周，FDA 预计将批准这种药物，许多科学家和医生认为这是第一种有望减缓阿尔茨海默病进展的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Why-the-next-big-hope-for-Alzheimere28099s-might-not-help-most-Black-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Why-the-next-big-hope-for-Alzheimere28099s-might-not-help-most-Black-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e88dab3-dc48-4962-8f80-890a3d287869 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 06:40:51 -0400 Why the next big hope for Alzheimer’s might not help most Black patients
蒙大拿州在私人住宅治疗计划中增加了对儿童的保护2001 年至 2004 年，梅格·阿普尔盖特 (Meg Applegate) 就读于蒙大拿州尤里卡市的 Chrysalis Therapeutic Boarding School for Girls 女子治疗寄宿学校，这是一所私立替代治疗项目，她曾遭受精神虐待，并且因打捆干草、砍柴等体力劳动造成的伤害而得不到医疗护理。木头和移动的岩石，她说。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Montana-adds-protections-for-kids-in-private-residential-treatment-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/Montana-adds-protections-for-kids-in-private-residential-treatment-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12dcf9a9-8360-4290-809b-e3895220ed15 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 06:39:29 -0400 Montana adds protections for kids in private residential treatment programs
高等法院的平权行动裁决可能如何影响医疗保健医生们担心，最高法院 6 月 29 日发布的裁决不仅会对医生和其他护理提供者接受培训的多样性产生深远影响，而且最终也会对患者护理产生深远影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/How-health-care-may-be-affected-by-the-high-courte28099s-affirmative-action-ruling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230706/How-health-care-may-be-affected-by-the-high-courte28099s-affirmative-action-ruling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5318822-fb8c-4291-aeac-7e16a34d8031 Thu, 06 Jul 2023 06:38:27 -0400 How health care may be affected by the high court’s affirmative action ruling
